item.description:
Don't be afraid! We are not going to recruit you!

If you have ever been approached by a friend, family member or a stranger about a business opportunity like Shaklee, MaryKay, Melaleuca, Trump Network, Market America or Avon, more than likely you are thinking (Oh no it's one of those thingy's, or that's a pyramid scam or they don't work). Well in stead of guessing what it is, You can come here and learn about all the different Home based, Network Marketing, MLM types, Direct selling businesses and have an understanding weather this is something you want to do.

We are a professional group of network marketing entreprenues who are educating those are looking at different ways to develop a stay at home income. Weather you know this or not, this is quickly becoming the way to create wealth and the american dream.

Meet and Greet with the experts of Network Marketers, Entrepreneurs and successful business professionals for educational information, support, discussions and coaching about new trends and techniques to solidify your strengths and perfect your skills.

Here is a place where you can get your questions answered about network marketing by the experts in this profession. Learn to know what to look for in evaluating a company that you want to join.

What is Network Marketing and how to Succeed at it?

Anthony Pasquale
AJP Enterprise
A Mindful Wealth Group
United Martial Arts Center
Osanna Seminars

"Live with Purpose and Passion Everyday" !

Ideal Business Center
20 Locust Street, Suite 100
Danvers MA 01923
(978) 836-6501

"It's remarkable, how much mediocrity we live with, surrounding ourselves with daily reminders that the average is acceptable. Our world suffers from terminal normality. Take a moment to access all the things around you that encourage you to remain "average". These are the things that keep you powerless, unable to go beyond a limit you have arbitrarily set for yourself."
item.name: Network Marketing Support Meetup Group
